doc.previous: The National Geographic Society was founded in the USA in 1888 and began publication of the National Geographic magazine which became and continues to be a great populariser of geographic information The society has long supported geographic research and education
doc.after: One of the first examples of geographic methods being used for purposes other than to describe and theorise the physical properties of the earth is John Snow s map of the 1854 Broad Street cholera outbreak Though a physician and a pioneer of epidemiology the map is probably one of the earliest examples of health geography
